txt.en:
'Our scouts report that a group of half-orcs have been stealing worm-eggs. This is troubling news, [placeholder]. I can only imagine their ultimate purpose with the worm-eggs.

'For now, though, let us deal with the immediate threat. The very presence of half-orcs in the area speaks of these evil times.

'Journey to Pend Eregion in the south-east and hunt down the servants of the White Hand. These half-orc abominations must be put to an end.'
'You have done well, [placeholder]. For now, the half-orcs have been thwarted.\n\n'Rest for a while, for you will need your strength again before long.'
'Our scouts reported seeing a small group of half-orcs in Pend Eregion to the south-east some distance away, just south of the road to Rivendell.'
Saruman's half-orcs have been seen stealing worm-eggs. Thus far, their full purpose remains unclear.
Half-orcs can be found south-east of Gwingris.\n\nCalelloth has instructed you to go forth and defeat the half-orcs who are stealing worm-eggs for their master.
Calelloth is at Gwingris, north-west of where you found the half-orcs.\n\nYou should speak with Calelloth regarding your victory against the half-orcs.
